Label.en: His mother, Arsinoe, was murdered in a plot after his father died, making Ptolemy king at only 5 years old!
Label.fr: His mother, Arsinoe, was murdered in a plot after his father died, making Ptolemy king at only 5 years old!
Label.es: His mother, Arsinoe, was murdered in a plot after his father died, making Ptolemy king at only 5 years old!

Label.en: Oh, and his parents were also brother and sister… that’s one messed up family tree!
